resources.string: Active network connection is required to download necessary files

This application performs dangerous operations.You\'re using this application on your own risk.Developer is not responsible for any damage done by this software.It is highly recommended to use this application under lower system load.
It is better to download kernels manually and putting them on {sdcard}/DualBoot/RespactiveDir to avoid corrupt downloads and thus bad flashes.
This will erase all your data on secondary ROM. Are sure?
This will remove all files related to Dual Boot mode including downloaded kernels. Are you sure want to continue?
Applying this mod will remove all your installed apps from secondary ROM. Please backup them before proceeding. Some apps like Play Store are most likely to crash if they\'re updated. Continue?
This will remove all apps from your secondary ROM. Are you sure?
